MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH54 postcode area of Livingston. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a repair due to an underground cable fault, we now needed to carry out an emergency shutdown from 10.00am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:25am on Friday, 26 March 2021
